details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.7.2.1 General - Metadata key in the Catalog
details.description: The document catalog dictionary of a conforming file shall contain the Metadata key whose value is a metadata stream as defined in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.3.2.

rule.description: The document catalog dictionary of a conforming file shall contain the Metadata key whose value is a metadata stream as defined in ISO 32000-2:2020, 14.3.2.

error.message: The document catalog dictionary doesn't contain metadata key.
